original: @227b * // rten 'brel gyi srung ba bzhugs //
analyzed: @227b * // rten 'brel gyi srung ba bzhugs //
translated: The Protection of Interdependence

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrapāṇi.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: klu rigs lnga la dug lnga ste //
analyzed: klu rigs lnga la dug lnga ste //
translated: The five families of nāgas have five poisons,

original: 'gro ba gzhan la gnod pa byed /
analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan la gnod pa byed /
translated: which harm other beings.

original: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste //
analyzed: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste //
translated: The characteristics of harm are as follows:🔽In narrow ravines, deep gorges,

original: brag par grog po gting rings dang // ri phug dog dang sgo dog mor //
analyzed: brag par grog po gting rings dang // ri phug dog dang sgo dog mor //
translated: narrow mountain caves, and narrow doors,🔽one is squeezed as if unable to fit through,

original: mi shong bzhin du 'tshang ba dang // lha khang khang phrul nyams mi dga' //
analyzed: mi shong bzhin du 'tshang ba dang // lha khang khang phrul nyams mi dga' //
translated: and one feels unhappy in temples, houses, and so forth.

original: chu dang 'dam rdzab zag pa ngan //
analyzed: chu dang 'dam rdzab zag pa ngan //
translated: Water, swamps, and muddy drains are bad.🔽One is harmed by yaks, oxen, goats, sheep,

original: g-yag dang ba glang ra lug dang // ri dgas gcan gzan khyi yis 'tshe //
analyzed: g-yag dang ba glang ra lug dang // ri dgas gcan gzan khyi yis 'tshe //
translated: wild animals, carnivores, and dogs.

original: gzar ba'i ril 'dzeg 'bab rmi //
analyzed: gzar ba'i ril 'dzeg 'bab rmi //
translated: One dreams of climbing steep cliffs and falling.🔽One's body and mind feel heavy,

original: lus dang shes pa lci ba dang // gnyid che sems skyo snang glu len //
analyzed: lus dang shes pa lci ba dang // gnyid che sems skyo snang glu len //
translated: one sleeps a lot, feels discouraged, and sings to oneself.

original: spro thung snying mi dga' ba 'ong //
analyzed: spro thung snying mi dga' ba 'ong //
translated: One is irritable and feels unhappy at heart.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: de dag bsrung dang gso bya'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag bsrung dang gso bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to protect and heal those,

original: rdzas kyi sbyor ba bstan par bya //
analyzed: rdzas kyi sbyor ba bstan par bya //
translated: I will teach the preparation of substances.

original: thun mong sbyor ba bshad bya ba //
analyzed: thun mong sbyor ba bshad bya ba //
translated: The common preparation will be explained.

original: ri dgas lte dri 'dre gsod chu //
analyzed: ri dgas lte dri 'dre gsod chu //
translated: Deer musk, mixed with the killer water,

original: nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi bo che //
analyzed: nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi bo che //
translated: The forest herb, and the great herb,🔽The great feces, the bile of fish,

original: dri chen nya yi mkhris pa dang // byi sku bdun du sbyar ba yis //
analyzed: dri chen nya yi mkhris pa dang // byi sku bdun du sbyar ba yis //
translated: And the seven-times-mixed dog feces,

original: klu gnyan sa bdag nag mod kor //
analyzed: klu gnyan sa bdag nag mod kor //
translated: Will kill the nāgas, gnyan, and sa bdag.

original: 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing //
translated: The bhūtas will not be able to harm.🔽Leprosy, smallpox, blisters, and sores,🔽Itching, scabies, and the absence of pus,

original: mdze 'bras shu ba za kong dang // bas ldag g-yan pa med pa la dang // gag pa lhog pa rma rims dang // tshad rims rgyu gzer 'byung po'i nad //
analyzed: mdze 'bras shu ba za kong dang // bas ldag g-yan pa med pa la dang // gag pa lhog pa rma rims dang // tshad rims rgyu gzer 'byung po'i nad //
translated: Tuberculosis, intermittent fever, wounds, and epidemics,🔽Fever, colic, and the diseases of bhūtas,

original: bza' dang gdags dang byugs dang bdugs //
analyzed: bza' dang gdags dang byugs dang bdugs //
translated: Eating, applying, anointing, and fumigating,🔽Are the supreme destroyers of all.

original: thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog / khyad par sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog / khyad par sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi //
translated: The special preparations are of four kinds.

original: lte dri shing kun aa ru ra //
analyzed: lte dri shing kun aa ru ra //
translated: Musk, all the woods, and arura,

original: dri chus sbyangs shing khong du btung //
analyzed: dri chus sbyangs shing khong du btung //
translated: Purified with urine, are to be drunk.

original: skad snyan tshe ring nad skoms srung //
analyzed: skad snyan tshe ring nad skoms srung //
translated: The voice becomes melodious, life is long, and disease is protected against.🔽Musk, mixed with the killer water,

original: lte dri 'dre gsod thang chu dang // nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi bo che //
analyzed: lte dri 'dre gsod thang chu dang // nags kyi rtsi dang rtsi bo che //
translated: The forest herb, and the great herb,

original: byi sku ha la dz'a ti dang // aa mri ta sbyar ba bcang ba'o //
analyzed: byi sku ha la dz'a ti dang // aa mri ta sbyar ba bcang ba'o //
translated: One should keep a mixture of bhisuk, hala, jati, and amrita.🔽The black aconite, which kills the combined smell of the stomach,

original: lte dri 'dre gsod ru rta nag / bdud rtsi rgya tshi las tshil dang // byi sku ha la mi phag bcud //
analyzed: lte dri 'dre gsod ru rta nag / bdud rtsi rgya tshi las tshil dang // byi sku ha la mi phag bcud //
translated: the five nectars, the fat, the bhisuk, hala, and the essence of the pig,

original: byug pa'i rdzas su bshad pa yin //
analyzed: byug pa'i rdzas su bshad pa yin //
translated: are explained as the substances for anointing.

original: rus chen mnan la bdug pa bya //
analyzed: rus chen mnan la bdug pa bya //
translated: Having pressed the great bone, one should fumigate.

original: nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin //
translated: Like darkness in the light of the sun.

original: jo bo rje dang / rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur //
analyzed: jo bo rje dang / rgya brtson 'grus seng ge'i 'gyur //
translated: The translation of Atisha and Gya Tsondru Senge.
